p: Chung: People normally perceive that COVID-19 is a respiratory disease. However, many people report digestive, circulatory, and psychiatric symptoms. So today we have experts from each department to discuss these issues. First of all, an unexpectedly large number of cases were observed wherein patients experienced psychiatric symptoms. Could you tell us about KM psychiatric treatments, research approach, areas of possible integration, and what needs to be prepared or applied in the future?
